20101223060840.000|20101223060842.000|CC1|DRIVERS HAD TO BE TOWED OUT.    
20101223060842.000|20101223060843.000|CC1|AND AT THIS MOTEL THERE WAS NO  
20101223060843.000|20101223060849.000|CC1|SHELTER FROM THE STORM AS WATER 
20101223060849.000|20101223060850.000|CC1|POURED OUTSIDE AND INSIDE.      
20101223060850.000|20101223060853.000|CC1|IN REDLAND, THIS ROAD HAD TO BE 
20101223060853.000|20101223060856.000|CC1|CLOSED AFTER THE PAVEMENT BEGAN
